articles.title: Brennan: What Caitlin Clark’s $78k salary really tells us about the WNBA - CNN
articles.description: Caitlin Clark is set to make $78,000 salary as the WNBA’s number 1 overall pick, which is about 137% less than the NBA’s number 1 overall pick who will earn $10.5M. CNN’s Christine Brennan says the disparity is the product of capitalism, but things will get b…
